text: Jaan Arder (February 26, 1952, Tallinn â€“ July 24, 2014) was an Estonian singer. He was a member of the rock band Apelsin and the early music ensemble Hortus Musicus. His older brother Ott Arder was a poet, children's writer and translator. Arder died in Tallinn from cancer, aged 62. ==References== Category:1952 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Deaths from cancer Category:Estonian singers Category:Musicians from Tallinn
title: Jaan Arder
